dc_title_s: Carte des possessions angloises & françoises du continent de l'Amérique septentrionale = Kaart van de Engelsche en Fransche bezittingen in het vaste land van Noord America, 1755.
dc_description_s: Colored by hand with some French forts circled in red. Relief shown pictorially. Shows "Longitude occidentale de Londres" and "de l'île de Fer." Described in Woodbury Lowery's The Lowery collection. 1912. WL 420. Based on Jean Palairet's Carte des possessions angloises françoises du continent de l'Amerique septentrionale, 1755. 1 map: hand col.; 42 x 57 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
